page.title: 10Clevedon Comprehensive
page.content: Clevedon Comprehensive School has 1325 mixed ability pupils split into four houses,with an age range of 11_18 years.(From September 1985,there will be three houses,the first and second years will form a lower school).A school uniform is worn in the lower years.The school operates on a ten day timetable. Science,languages,humanities,arts and practical subjects are all catered for.Merits and demerits are awarded for good and bad work.In the fourth and fifth years,O_Level and C.S.E. courses are followed leading to examinations.A_Levels can be taken in the Upper School. In 1985 an extra_curricular day(called "Day 11")was introduced where pupils chose an activityfrom a listcompiled by the staff,ranging from cookery to outings.
